sentence: Experimentados acuarelistas de diversos puntos del país se dan cita en el curso avanzado Acuarela, Mar y Arquitectura.
translation: Experienced watercolorists from various parts of the country meet at the advanced course 'Watercolor, Sea, and Architecture.'

sentence: Descubre Cartagena que imparte el pintor Manolo Jiménez en la UPCT los días 7 y 8 de julio.
translation: Given by painter Manolo Jiménez at the UPCT on July 7 and 8.

sentence: Composición, color o aplicación del claroscuro son algunos de los temas que profundizarán los estudiantes.
translation: Composition, color, or the application of chiaroscuro are some of the topics that the students will delve into.

sentence: Durante dos días, el artista granadino enseñará a los alumnos el método Conquistalacuarela, a través de ejercicios pensados y estructurados para que los participantes sean capaces de sintetizar y saber identificar los mecanismos mentales adecuados para poder conducir la acuarela con soltura e imprimir su sello personal.
translation: For two days, the artist from Granada will teach the students the method "Conquist the Watercolor," through well-thought-out and structured exercises so that the participants are able to synthesize and identify the appropriate mental mechanisms to confidently handle watercolor and imprint their personal style.

sentence: El curso, dirigido por el profesor de la Escuela de Arquitectura y Edificación, Pedro Jiménez, se impartirá en el campus CIM en horario de mañana y tarde.
translation: The course, directed by the professor from the School of Architecture and Building, Pedro Jiménez, will be held at the CIM campus in the morning and afternoon.

sentence: Manolo Jiménez Sánchez, licenciado en Bellas artes, ha realizado exposiciones individuales y colectivas y participado en certámenes en España, Italia, Canadá y China, entre otros países.
translation: Manolo Jiménez Sánchez, a graduate in Fine Arts, has held individual and group exhibitions and participated in competitions in Spain, Italy, Canada, and China, among other countries.

sentence: Ha impartido cursos y talleres intensivos de acuarela en numerosas ciudades.
translation: He has taught intensive watercolor courses and workshops in numerous cities.

sentence: Su obra figura en organismos oficiales como el cuartel general del Ejército del Aire, ayuntamientos e instituciones en varias comunidades autónomas; en colecciones particulares en España, USA, Canadá y México, entre otros.
translation: His work is featured in official institutions such as the Air Force Headquarters, town halls, and institutions in several autonomous communities; in private collections in Spain, the USA, Canada, and Mexico, among others.

sentence: Ha conseguido más de 100 premios en numerosos certámenes de pintura en España.
translation: He has won over 100 awards in numerous painting competitions in Spain.
